describe: Micronesia, officially known as the Federated States of Micronesia, is an island nation located in the western Pacific Ocean. It consists of four states spread across the Caroline Islands, known for their beautiful beaches, rich marine biodiversity, and vibrant cultural heritage.

cities.name: üèù Palikir
cities.geographical_location: Located on the island of Pohnpei, in the central part of the Federated States of Micronesia.
cities.climate: Tropical rainforest climate with high humidity and heavy rainfall throughout the year.
cities.famous_cuisine: Pohnpei pepper, coconut crab, and taro dishes.

cities.name: üèù Kolonia
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the northern coast of Pohnpei Island.
cities.climate: Tropical rainforest climate, characterized by warm temperatures and significant rainfall.
